channel.title: Sound intervals[317]
channel.description: Hey People! Ok well recently me and my other friend have been trying to add sound to our weapons and so on. The only problem is that I cannot get the weapon sound to match up with the hit and animation.... [code]frame174(000, 000, 000);[/code] is the code I am useing... but .. I don't exatly understand how the last 2 int work. I know the first one is the sound of the frame... but I don't have a good understaning og the last two. Can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 07:43:52 pm[/size][hr]errr help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 09:12:50 pm[/size][hr]plz anyone?

item.title: Sound intervals[317]
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

Hey People!
Ok well recently me and my other friend have been trying to add sound to our weapons and so on. The only problem is that I cannot get the weapon sound to match up with the hit and animation…

frame174(000, 000, 000);

is the code I am useing… but … I don’t exatly understand how the last 2 int work. I know the first one is the sound of the frame… but I don’t have a good understaning og the last two. Can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 07:43:52 pm[/size][hr]errr help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 09:12:50 pm[/size][hr]plz anyone?
